Main.DragFile: Drag a file or click to browse

Help.Title: Items Creator Help
Help.LookupKeyDescription: The lookup key can be set as follows:
Help.HoldingsId: The MMSID of an existing title and the ID of an existing Holdings record should be placed in the two leftmost columns.
Help.ItemFileds: The columns following the Holdings MMSID should include the item fields to be created. Search the rest_item.xsd for the name of the field, and then insert the field name as a column label.
Help.Example: For example, if you want to add an item to a title with MMSID '991234567' and Holdings record with ID '221234567', and the barcode of the item should be 'S0126151', Enumeration A should be '1' and Chronology I should be '2019', create an Excel file as shown below.
